email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a prompt vessel available for your shipment of 25,000MT of soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023.

The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the prompt offer. The rate of USD 45.50 per MT seems a bit high considering the current market. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window in Santos is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10-15, 2023. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Chartering
